channel.title: About on Emmett Padway
channel.description: Recent content in About on Emmett Padway

item.title: About
item.description: About me I am a research scholar at the National Institute of Aerospace (NIA) working with the NASA FUN3D group and developing a hyperbolic Navier-Stokes solver for adaptive space-time grids for the FUN3D code. I began my career in CFD as an undergraduate researcher for Professor Siva Nadarajah in the McGill Computational Aerodynamics Group, working on optimization and shape parameterization. I then moved to the University of Wyoming and worked on my PhD under Professor Dimitri Mavirplis.
